Rosen Skincare Earth Mask (2020 formulation)

Brand: Rosen Skincare

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Almond (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis) Oil, Zinc Oxide, Olivem 1000 (Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate), Niacinamide, Fuller s Earth (Solum Fullonum) Clay, Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis), Eucalyptus (Globulus Leaf) Oil, Radish Root (Leucono

Radish Root (Leuconostoc) Ferment, Lactobacillus & Coconut (Cocos Nucifera) Fruit Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
